name: v-study
description: Online education in the times of pandemic has left a lot of students alone in their homes, devoiding them of a potential enhancing peer community. People are now more distracted, unfocussed than ever and now have, significantly reduced concentration spans. We have come up with the idea (and prototype) of a Virtual Study Platform that will cater to all major needs of a student, from maintaining and working in a peer community to organising useful resources at one place. The major features of website includes:
